entry.title: TCP/IP
entry.content:
TCP/IP

1

1.1

It comes ture the sharing of computer resource and users can enjoy services on their own computers at the same time.

  • Wide Area Network (WAN)
  • Metropolitan Area Network (MAN)
  • Local Area Network (LAN)

Tips:

  • This means that administrators new email will be send to all group members.
  • SNS: Social network like WeChat circle of friends.

1.2

Batch Processing

At first, people used to place process and send it into Batch Processing System.

Time Sharing System

Many people use their own machine connected to the main server, which makes them feel like as if they have monopolized server.

TCP/IP

TCP/IP is a collective name of communication protocols.

Tips:

  • The Time Sharing System does not solve the problem of communication between computers. It was time to develop computer communication technology!
  • IP: Internet Protocol
  • SOHO: Small Office and Home Office.This means that companies where employees work in small offices or just at home.
  • VoIP: Voice over Internet Protocol. A service for transmitting voice over Internet Protocol.
  • iSCSI:Internet Small Computer Systems Interface

1.3

Network architectureProtocolsMain purpose
TCP/IPIP, ICMP, TCP, UDP, HTTP, TELNET. SNMP. SMTP..InternetLAN
IPX/SPX
(NetWare)		IPXSPXNPCPC LAN
AppleTalkDDP,RTMP,AEP,ATP,ZIPApple productionsLAN
DECnetDPR,NSP,SCPFront DEC minicomputer
OSIFTAM, MOIS, VT, CMIS/CMIP, CLNP, CONP-
XNSIDP,SPP,PEPXerox Network

CPU OS

  • CPU ARM | X86

  • OS

    UNIXWindowsMac OS XLinux

Protocol

Because the difference of CPU and OS, in order to transmit data correctky, they should abide same Protocol

(Packet)

  • Packet

1.4

OSI

OSI

entry.title: Mac Terminal
entry.content:
Mac Terminal basics tutorial

Code form

Basic code

  1. echo Print

  1. About file

    pwd | show current path

    cd | change the path

    !: u can drug it into Terminal to get the file path directly.

    ls

  2. clear Clear screen

  3. sudo | Get administrator privileges

  4. man XXX | Learn the useage of XXX

    !: Press q to exit

  5. caffeinate | Keep mac work

    !: Press ^Control -C to stop

  6. killall XXX | Kill XXX

  7. defaults

    Screencapture type

    show / Hide Folder

    !: ls -a also can be used to show hide folders

    Dock

    !; When u find there are too many symbols in Dock, u can delete it just by dragging.

  8. amazing echo
